comment: I enjoyed her class and she is a very understanding professor. Although, it was a rocky start, she is a well rounded and respected professor.

the workload of this course was all over the place--it either felt like we were doing nothing or everything was due at one time which made it stressful. each assignment has several components and the course was sometimes hard to navigate. wish the assignments would've been more spread out. takes awhile to grade, doesn't respond to emails, text her.

If you can, definitely take this professor! She gives valuable information needed to become a teacher. She goes above and beyond in providing important information to her classes. She cares deeply and is a very nice professor!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback
